text: Joseph Edward Presko (October 7, 1928 â€“ February 5, 2019) was an American professional baseball player. He was born in Kansas City, Missouri. He was a right-handed pitcher, he was signed by the St. Louis Cardinals in 1948 as an amateur free agent. He made his Major League Baseball debut on May 3, 1951. He later played for the Detroit Tigers from 1957 to 1958. Presko died at his home in Kansas City on February 5, 2019 at the age of 90. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1928 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Detroit Tigers players Category:St. Louis Cardinals players Category:Sportspeople from Kansas City, Missouri
title: Joe Presko
